summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hot Travelers feature in Journeyman dating app. All 33 backend tests passed (100%), including 10 new Hot Travelers specific tests. Frontend UI testing confirmed all Hot Travelers UI elements working correctly - toggle button with count, banner, badge on cards, destination indicator, and filter functionality.
passed_tests: Backend: Users with active schedules have is_hot_traveler=True
Backend: hot_travelers_count matches actual count in results
Backend: Hot travelers have trip_title and trip_ends fields
Backend: Hot travelers are sorted first in discovery results
Backend: Creating active schedule makes user a hot traveler
Backend: Future schedule does not make user a hot traveler
Frontend: Hot Travelers toggle button appears in header with count (3)
Frontend: Hot Travelers banner shows '3 Hot Travelers in your area!'
Frontend: Hot Traveler badge (orange 'HOT TRAVELER') appears on swipe cards
Frontend: Destination shown on Hot Traveler cards (e.g., 'Miami, FL')
Frontend: Filter toggle filters to show only hot travelers
Frontend: Toggle button highlights orange when filter is active
All 23 existing backend API tests still passing
critical_code_review_comments: Hot Travelers feature implementation is clean and well-structured
check_hot_traveler function correctly identifies users with active schedules
Frontend properly displays all Hot Traveler UI elements with correct data-testid attributes
Hot travelers are correctly prioritized in discovery results (sorted first)
seed_data_creation: Test users and schedules were pre-created by main agent
context_for_next_testing_agent: Hot Travelers feature fully tested and working. A user with an active travel schedule (start_date <= today <= end_date) appears as a 'Hot Traveler' with orange badge, destination info, and is prioritized in discovery. The UI shows a flame toggle button with count, a banner when hot travelers exist, and filter functionality. All backend endpoints return hot_travelers_count and is_hot_traveler fields correctly.
